name: js-gir-docs
description: JavaScript / TypeScript documentations generated by TypeScript Type Definitions

scripts.update:submodules: git submodule update --init --recursive && git submodule foreach git pull origin master
scripts.build:types:node-gtk: npm run clear:types:node-gtk && npm run ts-for-gir -- generate '*' -e node --useNamespace --moduleType commonjs
scripts.build:types:gjs: npm run clear:types:gjs && npm run ts-for-gir -- generate '*' -e gjs --useNamespace --moduleType esm
scripts.build:types: npm run build:types:gjs && npm run build:types:node-gtk
scripts.build:docs:node-gtk: npm run clear:docs:node-gtk && npm run typedoc -- --options ./typedoc.node.js --in @types/node-gtk
scripts.build:docs:gjs: npm run clear:docs:gjs && npm run typedoc -- --options ./typedoc.gjs.js --in @types/Gjs
scripts.build:docs: npm run build:docs:gjs && npm run build:docs:node-gtk
scripts.build:node-gtk: npm run build:types:node-gtk && npm run build:docs:node-gtk
scripts.build:gjs: npm run build:types:gjs && npm run build:docs:gjs
scripts.build: npm run build:gjs && npm run build:node-gtk
scripts.validate: npm run validate:gjs && npm run validate:node-gtk

author: Pascal Garber <pascal@artandcode.studio>
